scenery.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the natural features of a particular part of a country that you can see, such as mountains, forests, deserts etc
scenery.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The best part of the trip was the fantastic scenery.
scenery.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the painted background, furniture etc used on a theatre stage
